senses.sense_definition: Something that resembles a reduction but is not a true reduction.

examples.text: The theory was criticized as a <w>pseudoreduction</w> because it oversimplified the complex process.
He argued that the proposed solution was a <w>pseudoreduction</w> rather than a genuine explanation.

senses.sense_definition: The period of tetrad formation in nuclear division.

examples.text: Chromosomal pairing occurs during the stage of <w>pseudoreduction</w>.
Biologists observed the cell during <w>pseudoreduction</w> to understand the division process.
